== new / new_pixi( xsize, ysize, el_size_in_bytes, el_type ) ==

Create new Pixilang data container (pixi-container).

*Parameters*
 * xsize - width.
 * ysize - height.
 * el_size_in_bytes - size (in bytes) of the atomic element of the container. Valid values: 0 (pixel size); 1; 2; 4; 8.
 * el_type - type of the atomic element of the container. Valid values: 0 - signed integer; 1 - floating point; 2 - dynamic type.

*Return value*

Number of the container, or -1 (error).

*Examples*
{{{
p = new() //Create 1x1 pixi-container. Element size = pixel size. Element type = integer.
p = new( 4 ) //Create 4x1 pixi-container. Element size = pixel size. Element type = integer.
p = new( 4, 4 ) //Create 4x4 pixi-container. Element size = pixel size. Element type = integer.
p = new( 4, 4, 2 ) //Create 4x4 pixi-container. Element size = 2 bytes. Element type = integer.
p = new( 4, 4, 4, 1 ) //Create 4x4 pixi-container. Element size = 4 bytes. Element type = floating point.
}}}

== remove / remove_pixi( pixi ) ==

Remove pixi-container.

*Parameters*
 * pixi - number of a pixi-container.

*Examples*
{{{
p = new() //Create new pixi-container
remove( p ) //Remove it
}}}

== resize / resize_pixi( pixi, xsize, ysize, el_size_in_bytes, el_type ) ==

Resize a pixi-container.

*Parameters*
 * pixi - number of a pixi-container.
 * xsize - new width (or -1 if width not changed).
 * ysize - height (or -1 if width not changed).
 * el_size_in_bytes - size (in bytes) of the atomic element of the container. Valid values: 0 (pixel size); 1; 2; 4; 8; -1 -  not changed.
 * el_type - type of the atomic element of the container. Valid values: 0 - signed integer; 1 - floating point; 2 - dynamic type; -1 - not changed.

*Examples*
{{{
p = new() //Create new pixi-container
resize( p, 32 ) //Resize it from 1x1 to 32x1
remove( p ) //Remove
}}}

== clean / clean_pixi( pixi ) ==

Clean a pixi-container (fill with zeroes).

*Parameters*
 * pixi - number of a pixi-container.

*Examples*
{{{
p = new() //Create new pixi-container
clean( p ) //Clean
remove( p ) //Remove
}}}
